title: Great stay with family
text: Stayed here with three children in late December, 2003. Location is great for American Girl Place and other shopping. Staff was really outstanding to the children, providing us with "front of the line" passes for Walnut Room and coupons for Hancock tower. Very friendly. Also, my Priority Club gold got us an upgraded room. Late December is not a busy time so rooms were probably more available, and ours was wonderful. All this at a ridiculously low internet rate. But I was most impressed at how comfortable I felt staying there with children.
